dns.title: DNS
dns.description: Space separated list of DNS servers to use.

check_status_code.title: Default Check HTTP Code
check_status_code.description: Default HTTP code to check against (default: 200).

check_certificate_expiration_days.title: Default Check Certificate Expiration
check_certificate_expiration_days.description: Default amount of days to consider certificate as expired (default: 30).

check_frontend_ip.title: Default space separated list of Frontend IPs to check
check_frontend_ip.description: Default list of Frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used.
